Package schedule.manager.service.provided.json.mappers

Class ClassroomMapper

java.lang.Object
schedule.manager.service.provided.json.mappers.ClassroomMapper
public class ClassroomMapper extends Object
This class is responsible for mapping JSON data to Classroom objects and vice versa.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClassroomMapper

      public ClassroomMapper()
      Initializes a new instance of the ClassroomMapper class.

      This constructor creates an instance of the ObjectMapper class and performs the necessary initialization steps, such as registering a deserializer for the Classroom class and enabling output indentation during serialization.

  • Method Details

    • getClassrooms

      public List<Classroom> getClassrooms(String path) throws IOException
      Retrieves a list of Classroom objects from a specified file path.

      This method reads the contents of the file located at the specified path and deserializes the data into a list of Classroom objects using the ObjectMapper. The file must exist; otherwise, an IOException is thrown.

      Important: The file must be in a format compatible with the deserialization process. Make sure the file follows the appropriate format defined for Classroom objects.

      Parameters:
      path - the file path to read the Classroom data from
      Returns:
      a list of Classroom objects deserialized from the file
      Throws:
      IOException - if the file does not exist or cannot be created
